TITLE: Episode 28 - Leg Play
DESCRIPTION: I have a lot to be thankful for this year. I go over some things that have made my life better, Joe Biden's love of kids sitting in his lap and playing with his leg hair, an important update on Trump's impeachment, Mayor Pete's conflict with AOC, and your first red pill of the week.
